name: Commandblocks
author: [royal]sk7725[]
description:
A mod that adds a multitude of new features, such as:
[orange]Next-level Blocks[], such as Command Blocks, Note Blocks or Air Walls;
[white]Commands[] and [accent]Skills[] that you can research and use;
A completely new [scarlet]Gamemode[];
And much more!

[accent]Thanks to:
우파루파, 영감, Xelo, Sonnicon, Gdeft, Eldoofus, EyeofDarkness[]
[royal]한국어/Korean translation by sk7725.[]

[royal]Indonesia translation by Gdeft.[]

https://discord.gg/RCCVQFW[]
